body: #MFG Labs iconset =============== ##Awesome web font icon by MFG Labs How does it work? Easy as pie Start by downloading the project on this url. 1. Copy the font directory into your project 2. Copy the mfglabs_iconset.css style sheet into your project. 3. Copy the link of the stylesheet into you header `` ###Drop the markup `` anywhere `` ##Customisation Size subclass Create bevel and emboss is easy by using custom sub class ###Add the subclass icon2x oir icon3x `< class="icon-cloud icon3x" aria-hidden="true">` ###Customise your css directly in mfglabs_iconset.css `.icon2x { font-size: 2em; }` `.icon3x { font-size: 3em; }`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Awesome web font icon by MFG Labs
name: Mfglabs-iconset
